All original packing must be included. # Up for Sale is a 2018 Sterling St. Vincent Electric Guitar! by Music Man! Stealth Black Finish! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Sterling by Music Man St. Vincent Electric Guitar. This is a Import Copy of the Music Man St. Vincent guitar. A Made In USA Music Man St. Vincent will set you back $2399.00 The Sterling is just a fraction of the price and is a great playing and sounding guitar with a lot of the same features as the Music Man. From The Web: The fresh and unique lines of the “St. Vincent” guitar represent the collaboration between the Award Winning Engineering team of Ernie Ball Music Man and Grammy Award winning guitarist St. Vincent. The STV60 is a perfect combination of style, balance, versatility and playability. The Sterling by Music Man version of the “St. Vincent” guitar, the STV60, features a gracefully shaped African Mahogany body, three specially designed mini-humbucker pickups wound and voiced to Music Man specifications, all wired in custom configuration to a 5-way pickup selector, Sterling by Music Man design “Vintage Tremolo” with bent steel saddles, 25.5-inch scale, Maple neck/Rosewood fretboard with 12-inch radius, 22 frets, and 4+2 headstock with “St. Vincent” signature logo. Unique body style and versatile sound. The St. Vincent offers many of the features of the Ernie Ball Music Man model at a more affordable price point. Unique and original in design, yet familiar in a perfect combination of style, balance, versatility and playability. A completely new, refreshing design; as individual and fearless as St. Vincent's music. Featuring a perfectly balanced, bevel-top African Mahogany body, Rock Maple neck and Rosewood fretboard with St. Vincent signature fretboard inlays, this guitar is a stunner on every level. An amazing array of tonal variations are available from the three specially voiced, Ernie Ball Music Man specification mini-humbuckers which are selected by a custom configured 5 way switch. The two-point, bent steel saddle "Vintage Tremolo", oversized Ernie Ball Music Man 4 + 2 headstock providing straight string pull for unrivaled tuning stability, and factory equipped Ernie Ball Slinky strings keep you in tone and in tune.SPECIFICATIONSBodyBody shape:OtherBody type:Solid bodyBody material:Solid woodTop wood:Body wood:MahoganyBody finish:GlossOrientation:Right handedNeckNeck shape:Artist SignatureNeck wood: Rock MapleJoint:Bolt-onScale length:25.5 in.Truss rod:StandardNeck finish:SatinFingerboardMaterial:RosewoodRadius:9.5 in.Fret size:Narrow Number of frets:22Inlays:Signature ArtistNut width/material1.65 in.
